scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Arnow used note cards (usually typed) for many of her speeches. Speech topics include Appalachia, American history, education, reading, and writing. The bundles in Folder 6 include cards that were already packaged together by rubber bands, suggesting that each bundle was used for a particular speech. The bundles in Folder 7 include fragments of speeches that have been bound only to prevent shuffling.
